title: riot i dont like me and my team stomping a twitch and vayne in laning phase
body: only to lose to them because we couldn't end the game in 10 minutes. :/

replies.body:
Come on. Having a vayne on enemy team is freelo 90% of the time. It's mostly just the same idiots who play yasuo.

Twitch on the other hand has been the best champion in the game for over a year so I can agree with that one somewhat.

Come on man, they already crippled Vayne's late game power for the sake of the early game already with the changes to her Q

What more do you want? The fact that she goes invisible won't change, and that's basically her most bothersome feature

> [{quoted}](name=Ok sure but why,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=K8KEL9U4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-23T06:17:59.870+0000)
>
> Come on man, they already crippled Vayne's late game power for the sake of the early game already with the changes to her Q
> 
> What more do you want? The fact that she goes invisible won't change, and that's basically her most bothersome feature

Yes. Let's ignore her %health true damage
It's the healthiest kind of true damage and perfectly needed against such a hardcore tank meta

well vayne wasnt the biggest issue that game but she was still a problem. my main focus was twitch went idk 0/6 early game, i got first tower and everything but comes 20 mins into the game he just pops up and deletes me and my team with us (especially me since i was the most fed on my team and was their adc).

i think riot should put an indicator if hes near with his invis at least so we can have time to prepare for him, dude just pops up and crits me to death with zero warning.
